data.title: The Aster - Banff Avenue Housing Development
data.meta_description: Price-restricted affordable housing development home ownership project on Banff Avenue.
data.text:
The Town of Banff developed a complex with 33 dwelling units in the heart of downtown Banff to provide affordable, for-purchase housing for eligible Banff residents. This development, called The Aster, is part of the Banff Housing Strategy to ensure those working in Banff are able to live in Banff. The homes were sold at the cost of construction only. The development was complete in October 2023.

Banff celebrates completion of 33 new homes in The Aster

The Banff Housing Corporation will manage the building and sales of the dwellings. Learn more at banff.ca/housing

The Aster is named after a perennial wildflower frequently found in Banff National Park.

The Aster is located at 340 Banff Avenue.

Learn more about The Aster, floor plans, price lists and more at AsterBanff.ca.

Learn about the Hindes Cabin, a heritage structure on the site that will be preserved and integrated into the common area of the condominium complex.

Inquiries about the Banff Housing Corporation? Contact Heather Bolt, BHC Housing Development Coordinator, 403.497.5242 or heather.bolt@Banff.ca

General questions about the Banff Housing Strategy? Email housing sustainability manager Sharon Oakley.
